config.title: BlueSpice Configuration
config.globalDescription: This configuration allows you to define the base URL of a BlueSpice instance. The path can then be extended in the repository settings.
config.description: This configuration allows you to define a supplementary path to a base URL defined in the global configuration. If no path has been defined, the base URL is referenced.

blueSpice.description: May modify the global BlueSpice configuration

*.description: May modify the repository specific BlueSpice configuration for all repositories

configureBlueSpice.description: May modify the repository specific BlueSpice configuration
